author: deluckybrick
title: REALLY FAST CAR!
review:
This set is so cool because the car is so fast, but not fast enough to spin around annoyingly. It actually jumps, too, just remember to secure the ramp.
All in all, a excellent set. I would recommend it to someone with an already large collection of racers.

author: tonga256
title: wee!
review:
this set is really cool it comes with a ramp witch it can jump on. The only bad thing is it spins around alot not forwards but it's better than others, it has a pull back moter!

GOOD.
pull back moter,
doesn't take up much space.

BAD.
spins around alot and doesn't go forward much.

author: StarWarsLegoFan123
title: My First Racer!
review: My parents got me this set when I was very little. And I have to admit, they had good taste! This set comes with a ramp and the racer. I lost the ramp :( ,but the car still entertains me today with its pull-back motor. And it turns during its drive! I really like this set and if you like racers, I recommend that you get it!

author: Capitán_Skrall
title: Really fast, really fun.
review:
Well, this set proofs that only 30 pieces are enough to make an awsome model.

First of all, it comes with a small pull-back motor, and some fancy printed pieces, in addition to the weird minifig, wich its just a head and a base, I´ll say more about it). Some wheels and a nice ramp finish the inventory. The colours chosen gives an elegant look to it.

Now, the build is really simple. It only takes a few steps to finish the racer due to the fact that is built around the pull back motor, wich is really big. 

But, the result its great, I love the set, the motor is really strong. It still works like the first day (I got it back in 2003), and the ramp its a nice addition. I´s actually hard for me to accomplish a clean jump, but the playability in a set this small its surprising.

This is not a complete minifig, Its a small base that simulates a small minifig body, and a head (a really nice one, and the printed helmet its superb). This isn´t a con, because a normal body looks way to big in this small racer, so overall is Ok.

Pros:
-Great model overall.
-Really strong pull back motor, the car goes really fast.
-The addition of a ramp is always welcome.
-Some useful printed pieces.
-Excellent colour scheme.

Cons:
-It may be very small for some people, but for the price is fair.
-A not so good building experience.

Overall this one deserves a 5/5 from me.
